title: Git issue: git reset --hard <sha> -> fatal: Could not parse object
body:
Hi,

I have issues with git reset --hard <sha>. I  just cloned the project with the following command:

```
$git clone https://github.com/alibaba/fastjson
$git reset --hard 57d0434ab01c55e719bb52f3ec96bf12cad0e46c
fatal: Could not parse object '57d0434ab01c55e719bb52f3ec96bf12cad0e46c'.
```
I have no experience of getting that error message before. 
I also tried doing git checkout.
```
$ git checkout 57d0434ab01c55e719bb52f3ec96bf12cad0e46c
fatal: reference is not a tree: 57d0434ab01c55e719bb52f3ec96bf12cad0e46c
```

I keep getting these issues. Is there something wrong with this particular repository that does not allow me to go to that commit? Any help is much appreciated.

title: 1.2.7.sec01升级到1.2.58后，RPC远程调用使用Hessian反序列化问题
body:
场景（fastjson1.2.58，rpc调用序列化反序列化使用hessian）：
1、使用如下Json字符串（不规范的，1111111111111111111不是String）反序列化为Map。
```
String source = "{\"key\": {1111111111111111111: \"00000000011111111111111\"} }";
Map<String, Object> param =  JSONObject.parseObject(source, Map.class);
```
2、使用该param作为rpc调用参数调用，该参数中含有JSONObject对象，且该对象的内部Map中，存在key非String的情况1111111111111111111。
![豆芽图片20190718180045](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5554418/61448721-0076ac80-a986-11e9-8e73-8105d6d83b40.png)

3、调用到提供方后，hessian反序列化时，生成JSONObject报异常
Caused by: java.lang.ClassCastException: java.lang.Long cannot be cast to java.lang.String
	at com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject.put(JSONObject.java:51)
	at com.caucho.hessian.io.MapDeserializer.readMap(MapDeserializer.java:114)
	at com.caucho.hessian.io.SerializerFactory.readMap(SerializerFactory.java:520)
	at com.caucho.hessian.io.Hessian2Input.readObject(Hessian2Input.java:2117)
	at com.caucho.hessian.io.MapDeserializer.readMap(MapDeserializer.java:114)
	at com.caucho.hessian.io.SerializerFactory.readMap(SerializerFactory.java:522)
	at com.caucho.hessian.io.Hessian2Input.readObject(Hessian2Input.java:2110)
	at com.caucho.hessian.io.BasicDeserializer.readLengthList(BasicDeserializer.java:599)
	at com.caucho.hessian.io.Hessian2Input.readObject(Hessian2Input.java:1782)
	at com.caucho.hessian.io.UnsafeDeserializer$ObjectFieldDeserializer.deserialize(UnsafeDeserializer.java:419)

原因分析：由于传递的Map中有非String的Key（1111111111111111111）。

通过在反序列化时增加Map<String, Object> param =  JSONObject.parseObject(source, Map.class, Feature.NonStringKeyAsString); 可以解决，但需要全盘回归代码。

请问对于升级到1.2.58后不兼容的问题，有什么好的解决办法？

title: Fixed typo: deserializer
body:
本pr仅仅影响局部变量名，不用担心兼容问题，并且无命名冲突
This pr only affects local variable names, so no need to worry about compatibility issues. It's also naming-conflict free.
```
derializer => deserializer
deserizer => deserializer
beanDerializer => beanDeserializer
```

title: "Bad" Test Name Detection (Research proposal, feedback needed)
body:
Hello Developers for alibaba/fastjson:

I'm Jianwei Wu, and a PhD student from University of Delaware. I'm conducting an evaluation of my current research work, and the following contents are partial results of my research. In order to evaluate my work, I might need your feedbacks for the following contents.

Explanation of the contents: 
The following contents are some improvements of existing test names in your Github project (this project). The first line shows the original test names, and the second line shows our extracted components from the test name and the test body. If they are not matching, then we will consider it "bad" for the test name. "Better" test name means we take the extracted components from the test body to provide a "better" version of the test name. For your feedbacks, you can accept or reject our modification, and a partial accept or reject is also welcomed. Any other kinds of feedbacks or comments are also welcomed.

Contents: 
TestName: test (Issue1392)
SC body action: [Refer to Alternative] (Alternative Action: indexOf=2 )
SC body predicate: assertTrue
SC body scenario: println (Alternative Scenario: reponse=1 )
SC name action: null(Regex)
SC name predicate: null(Regex)
SC name scenario: null(Regex)
-> 
unmatched with name
unmatched with name
unmatched with name
-> 
"Better" test name -> IndexOf(...)True(...)Reponse

TestName: test_0 (Bug_for_wuzhengmao)
SC body action: getId[1st] get[2rd] (Alternative Action: get=4 )
SC body predicate: getParent[Only]
SC body scenario: setId (Alternative Scenario: result=1 )
SC name action: 0(Regex)
SC name predicate: null(Regex)
SC name scenario: null(Regex)
-> 
unmatched with name
unmatched with name
unmatched with name
-> 
"Better" test name -> GetId/Get(...)GetParent(...)SetId/Result

TestName: test_codegen (GenTest)
SC body action: gen (Alternative Action: gen=1 )
SC body predicate: N/A
SC body scenario: out (Alternative Scenario: generator=1 )
SC name action: N/A(NLP)
SC name predicate: N/A(NLP)
SC name scenario: codegen(NLP)
-> 
unmatched with name
unmatched with name
unmatched with name
-> 
"Better" test name -> Gen(...)Out/Generator

TestName: test_7 (JSONScannerTest_scanSymbol)
SC body action: matchStat[Only] | toCharArray

SC body scenario: N/A (Alternative Scenario: hashCode=1 )
SC name action: 7(Regex)

SC name scenario: null(Regex)
->

---End

Thank you so much for your help and any feedback would be appreciated! 
Jianwei Wu

title: JSONObject 1.2.57开始被重写的toJavaObject()方法
body:
**问题描述：**
经过详细的排查发现1.2.57开始，JSONObject类重写了toJavaObject()方法，被重写的方法不再支持转自身类型与JSONObject类型的转换。

**期望：**
去掉方法重写，或增强重写方法。如果为类型本身将不需要转换，如果是JSONObject类型，执行JSONObject转换操作。

title: [Feature] JSONPath功能增强
Add unit tests for com.alibaba.fastjson.util.Base64
body:
Hi,

I've analysed your code base and noticed that `com.alibaba.fastjson.util.Base64` in the `fastjson` module is not fully tested.

I've written some tests that cover this class with the help of [Diffblue Cover](https://www.diffblue.com/opensource).

Hopefully, these tests should help you detect any regressions caused by future code changes. If you would find it useful to have additional tests written for this repository, I would be more than happy to look at other particular classes that you consider important.

title: 请升级至最新的Jackson-databind
body:
CVE-2019-12086：jackson-databind任意文件读取漏洞
FasterXML Jackson是美国FasterXML公司的一款适用于Java的数据处理工具。jackson-databind是其中的一个具有数据绑定功能的组件。
FasterXML jackson-databind 2.9.9之前的2.x版本中存在信息泄露漏洞。该漏洞源于网络系统或产品在运行过程中存在配置等错误。未授权的攻击者可利用漏洞获取受影响组件敏感信息。
影响版本：2.x <  2.9.9
修复版本：2.9.9
CVSS v3：7.5

来源：
http://www.cnnvd.org.cn/web/xxk/ldxqById.tag?CNNVD=CNNVD-201905-776
https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2326
漏洞复现及PoC：
https://github.com/c0d3p1ut0s/CVE-2019-12086-jackson-databind-file-read/
漏洞演示：
https://twitter.com/pyn3rd/status/1133018970695643136?s=12

title: JDK7环境下1.2.52版本异常，使用了BigInteger.intValueExact
body:
我在JDK7的环境下使用了FastJson 1.2.52版本，然后在序列化一个Double类型的时候，出现了NoSuchMethod异常：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9033116/56888370-57b36200-6aa6-11e9-9870-c06246fb318e.png)

异常堆栈如图所示：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9033116/56888398-71ed4000-6aa6-11e9-9986-adde21fc4c88.png)

我在翻看了JDK7和8的BigInteger的时候，发现方法intValueExact是JDK8新增的，
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9033116/56888528-c1cc0700-6aa6-11e9-9958-10d81fb87007.png)


由于我刚刚出现这个异常，且一时之间没找到JDK版本与FastJson之间的兼容性说明，所以提了这个Issue。

title: FastJsonConfig设置全局WriteNullNumberAsZero特性，如何让部分实体序列化时忽略这个特性
body: Web应用中通过FastJsonConfig的setSerializerFeatures（）方法设置了全局的WriteNullNumberAsZero特性，如何针对某个实体忽略这个特性，null数值字段不自动替换为0

title: JSONField注解指定serialzeFeatures=SerializerFeature.WriteBigDecimalAsPlain不生效
body:
fastjson版本 1.2.55

```
@JSONField(serialzeFeatures = SerializerFeature.WriteBigDecimalAsPlain)
 private BigDecimal num;
```
如上，在实体类的属性上加了JSONField注解，并指定serialzeFeatures=SerializerFeature.WriteBigDecimalAsPlain不生效
试图解决的问题：
当num的值为0.00000001时，默认toString后的值为科学计数法1e-8，业务需要展示为0.00000001

采用SON.toJSONString(bean, SerializerFeature.WriteBigDecimalAsPlain)可以达到出预期结果
采用@JSONField(serialzeFeatures = SerializerFeature.WriteBigDecimalAsPlain)及JSON.toJSONString(bean)，无法达到预期效果
